notFound: Command not found. Type 'help' for a list of commands.

placeholder.subtitle: Type a command to get started. For a list of commands, type 'help'.

commands.color: Switches to color mode. Example: color red
commands.mustColor: You must specify a color. Example: color red
commands.invalidColor: Invalid color. Available colors: red, green, blue, yellow, grey
commands.lang: Switches to language mode. Example: lang es
commands.mustLang: You must specify a language. Example: lang es
commands.invalidLang: Invalid language. Available languages: en, es,de
commands.font: Switches to font size. Example: font 16
commands.mustFont: You must specify a font size. Example: font 16
commands.invalidSize: Invalid font size. Available from 1 to 72
